attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I understand that abortion is the only way to control the population in the uk but if you really think about it, real life babies are being killed, and they could have grown up to be a very important person.

If murder is illegal i don't see why abortion is legal as they are pretty much the same, unless you want to legalise murder.

Do you understand my point?

Please sign!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
